Game information:  


Stronghold Crusader 2 - is a long-awaited sequel to the original
castle-sim Stronghold: Crusader. 12 years later returned to the
Stronghold in 1189 in the desert of the Middle East, but with a
new and realistic system 3Ddvizhkom destruction locks created
using Havok Physics.

New Stronghold true to its roots and is an old-school game that
combines elements of real-time strategy and simulation of urban
development. Choosing between fierce crusaders and Arab freedom
fighters, you have to lead into battle huge armies and siege
equipment to decide the fate of the Holy Land. Enter the war
on behalf of Richard the Lionheart or the Sultan of Syria in
two historic single player campaign where you will be accompanied
by dynamic events such as tornadoes and locust invasion. Become
the greatest Lord, taking the reins of economic management in the
wilderness, and holding kontol over vital oases.

RePack Features:  

Stronghold Crusader 2
Includes Update 1
Do not recoded
Cut game trailer
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
